description: Belmont Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource properties in Canada and the United States. It explores for copper, gold, lithium, and uranium projects located in British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Washington, and Nevada States. The company holds a 100% interest in the Come By Chance copper-gold porphyry project located in the Greenwood mining camp. Belmont Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
